comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: A confusing history to this building is explained on the Powerhouse daily photo blog: www.powerhousemuseum.com/imageservices/?p=497 And a short history of the Capitol Theatre: www.capitoltheatre.com.au/explore_timeline.htm The building in the photo was dismantled and rebuilt several metres higher in 1915. Several rebuilds since, but still recognizable in the Google street view: maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&...
